summary: The MkDocs AI Hooks project enhances technical documentation and blogs by integrating AI-driven summary generation and intelligent reading statistics using MkDocs hooks. Key features include AI-generated summaries, multi-language support, smart content cleaning, efficient caching, and flexible configuration. It also offers precise Chinese character counting, code detection, estimated reading time, and a visually appealing display. The tool supports automatic language recognition, content type detection, cache optimization, error handling, and customizable API services. Future plans include multi-AI service support and automatic selection.
